Description:
A general failure to follow the guidelines ("Server rules") section on the about page will, depending on the severity, lead to the removal of your posts or your account.

Welcome to CatCatNya~! We are an instance hoping to foster a diverse queer community's presence in the Fediverse, which includes, but is absolutely not limited to:

  • cats
  • queerness
  • plurality
  • disability
  • anti-racism

We are mainly speaking English and German, but other languages are also welcome.

Basically, the only things we exclude is fascists and tankies. We do not like those. Authoritarianism is garbage because it is detrimental to what's mentioned above. Yes, even cats. Have you ever seen a cat like authority?

Unfortunately, some authority is required to do moderation and even to host an instance to begin with.

We are meowderated by:

  • @kescher - Foundnya, Hostnya, Nyadmin and Meowderator
  • @sk - Nyadmin and Meowderator

We have additional subdomains for multi-account access in separate browser tabs:

  • 0.catcatnya.com
  • 1.catcatnya.com
  • 2.catcatnya.com
  • 3.catcatnya.com
  • 4.catcatnya.com
  • 5.catcatnya.com
  • 6.catcatnya.com
  • 7.catcatnya.com
  • 8.catcatnya.com
  • 9.catcatnya.com

We offer SSO integration with some services: - git.kescher.at, a Forgejo instance - git.gay, another Forgejo instance

Federation policy

CatCatNya~ will generally freely federate, however, meowderation is strict. Defederation will occur if harassment occurs, fash/tankies are on the overwhelming majority on an instance, an instance being "free speech", or if an instance is otherwise deemed an immediate danger to users on CatCatNya~. If an instance does not pose an active threat to its users, but is deemed unmeowderated, it will likely result in a limit. Actions done by remote nyadmins/meowderators are weighed more heavily than individual users.

If your instance uses the UFoI, it will likely be suspended, since the very nature of the UFoI is a malicious pact founded by the admin of qoto.org to stop folks from defederating from them.

If your instance welcomes cops, it will at the very least be limited, but we may suspend.

While our set of guidelines already states that anything illegal in Austria will be blocked, we feel it is neccessary to highlight that we suspend any instances promoting child sex abuse ("MAPs" and other euphemisms for pedophilia) and zoophilia once we notice them.

If your instance runs a really old version of a Fedi software and it causes processing issues at our end, your instance may be suspended simply because you don't keep your software up-to-date at all. You shouldn't be running Mastodon 2.5.2 anymore. No, 2.7.0 is also not going to cut it.

Other info

We are running our own fork of glitch-soc, which is also a fork of Mastodon. For more info about glitch-soc, see the glitch-soc webpage. For more info about our own fork see this git repository.

In response to the poor performance of big instances like mastodon.social and mastodon.online, we are implementing the following simple policy: Once we reach around 200 monthly active users, we will disable registrations. We are strongly opposed to the existence of big instances of software for a decentralized protocol.

This instance is hosted on the same machine as an Arch mirror. Therefore, the network performance on this instance may vary. This should not be a real issue, considering these server specs:

  • 14 dedicated cores of an AMD EPYCâ„¢ 7702 CPU
  • 64 GiB of DDR4 ECC RAM
  • Storage:
    • 2 TiB of NVMe storage
    • Continually scaled, remote, encrypted media storage, partially cached on NVMe above
  • Hosted in Vienna, Austria
  • Network bandwidth of 2.5 Gbps, symmetric
  • Running on , btw
  • Daily encrypted backups to a large backup host

Donate to our moderation team:

Donation links for hosting this instance, more info about the Ownya and more at kescher.at.

Description:
Encuentra mÃ¡s servicios Chilemasto en Home

Staff

Admin: @skrlet13@chilemasto.casa

Mod: @muertasflores@chilemasto.casa

@dinomug@chilemasto.casa Propinas para dinomug

Ayuda a mantener el server aquÃ­

Chilemasto busca ser una instancia acogedora para gente chilena, pero gente de cualquier nacionalidad puede unirse. Se busca ser un espacio mÃ¡s sano y agradable que la de las redes sociales mainstream.

Código de conducta

(Basado en Community Covenant by Coraline Ada Ehmk. Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/). Based on a work at http://community-covenant.net/.)

Nuestra meta

Esta comunidad está dedicada a proporcionar una experiencia libre de acoso para todes. No toleramos el acoso de les participantes de ninguna forma.

Aplicabilidad y Alcance

Este código de conducta se aplica a todos los espacios de esta comunidad, incluidos los canales públicos, los canales privados y los mensajes directos, tanto en línea como fuera de ella. Cualquier persona que viole este código de conducta puede ser sancionada o expulsada de estos espacios a discreción de les administradores y/o moderadores.

Hacia un entorno acogedor y seguro

Esperamos crear un entorno en el que diversas personas puedan colaborar e interactuar de manera positiva y afirmativa. Los ejemplos de comportamiento que contribuyen a crear este tipo de entorno incluyen:

  • Uso de lenguaje acogedor e inclusivo
  • Ser respetuoso de los diferentes puntos de vista y experiencias.
  • Aceptando con gracia la crítica constructiva
  • Centrarse en lo que es mejor para la comunidad en general
  • Mostrar empatía hacia otros miembros de la comunidad.

Declaración contra el acoso

Esta comunidad no tolerará el acoso de ningún tipo. Los ejemplos de acoso incluyen:

  • Comentarios ofensivos relacionados con género, identidad y expresión de género, orientación sexual, discapacidad, enfermedades mentales o físicas, neuro(a)tipicidad, apariencia física, estado de embarazo, estado de veterano, afiliación política, estado civil, tamaño corporal, edad, raza, origen nacional , origen étnico, nacionalidad, estatus migratorio, idioma, religión o falta de ella, u otro marcador de identidad. Esto incluye racismo anti-indígena y anti-negritud.
  • Comentarios no deseados con respecto a las elecciones y prácticas de estilo de vida de una persona, incluidos los relacionados con la alimentación, la salud, la crianza de los hijos, las relaciones, las drogas y el empleo.
  • Misgendering deliberado, es decir, uso de pronombres inapropiados o uso de nombres "muertos" o rechazados.
  • Imágenes o comportamientos sexuales gratuitos o fuera de tema en espacios donde no son apropiados.
  • Contacto físico y contacto físico simulado sin consentimiento o después de una solicitud de suspensión de la actitud.
  • Amenazas de violencia.
  • La incitación a la violencia hacia cualquier individuo o grupo, incluso alentar a una persona a suicidarse o a autolesionarse.
  • Intimidación deliberada.
  • Acecho o seguimiento (stalking): en línea o en el mundo físico.
  • Atención sexual no deseada, sin consentimiento.
  • Patrones de contacto social inapropiado, como solicitar / asumir niveles inapropiados de intimidad con otros.
  • Comunicación continua uno a uno después de las solicitudes de parar.
  • "Sacar del closet" deliberadamente cualquier aspecto de la identidad de una persona sin su consentimiento, excepto cuando sea necesario para proteger a las personas vulnerables del abuso intencional.
  • Publicación de comunicación privada sin acoso.
  • Los chistes que se asemejan a lo anterior, como el "racismo irónico", todavía cuentan como acoso, incluso si son satíricos o irónicos.

Si tiene preguntas o inquietudes sobre estos temas, no dude en enviar un mensaje a un administrador o solicitar la oportunidad de explorar el problema con un moderador y voluntarios.

Informes

Si un miembro de nuestra comunidad lo está acosando, observe que alguien más está siendo acosado o tiene alguna otra inquietud, comuníquese con los administradores a través de mensaje privado. Si la persona que lo acosa está en el equipo administrativo, no estará involucrada en el manejo o la resolución del incidente.

El equipo de administración responderá a cualquier queja tan pronto como sea posible. Si no recibe una respuesta oportuna (por ejemplo, si actualmente no hay administradores en línea), primero ponga su seguridad personal y su bienestar, y considere cerrar sesión.

Este código de conducta se aplica a los espacios de nuestra comunidad, pero si un miembro de nuestra comunidad le está acosando fuera de nuestros espacios, aún queremos saberlo. Tomaremos en serio todos los informes de buena fe de acoso por parte de nuestros miembros, especialmente por parte de les administradores. Esto incluye el acoso fuera de nuestros espacios y el acoso que tuvo lugar en cualquier momento. El equipo de abuso se reserva el derecho de excluir a las personas de la comunidad en función de su comportamiento pasado, incluido el comportamiento fuera de nuestros espacios y el comportamiento hacia las personas que no están en esta comunidad.

Para proteger a los voluntarios del abuso y el agotamiento, nos reservamos el derecho de rechazar cualquier informe que creamos que se haya hecho de mala fe. Los informes destinados a silenciar las críticas legítimas pueden eliminarse sin respuesta.

Proceso

Cada informe de violación del código de conducta será tratado con seriedad y cuidado. Si la seguridad inmediata de un miembro se ve amenazada, une administradore individual puede tomar cualquier acción que considere apropiada, incluida la prohibición temporal del acceso para le infractore de la comunidad. En situaciones menos urgentes, al menos une administradore dará una respuesta adecuada, que se compartirá con le infractore en privado. Cualquiera sea la resolución que decidan, la decisión de les administradores involucrados en un caso de violación del código se considerará final.

Respetaremos las solicitudes de confidencialidad con el fin de proteger a las víctimas de abuso. A nuestro criterio, podemos nombrar públicamente a una persona sobre la cual hemos recibido quejas de acoso, o advertir en privado a terceros sobre ellas, si creemos que hacerlo aumentará la seguridad de nuestros miembros o del público en general. No nombraremos víctimas de acoso sin su consentimiento.

Consecuencias

Se espera que los participantes a les que se le soliciten detener cualquier comportamiento de acoso lo cumplan de inmediato. Si un participante se involucra en un comportamiento de acoso, los administradores pueden tomar cualquier acción que consideren apropiada, incluida la expulsión de la comunidad e identificación del participante como acosador para otros miembros. A discreción de los administradores, o por solicitud, una o más de las partes involucradas pueden solicitar discutir la violación y cómo evitar situaciones similares en el futuro.

Reglas adicionales

  • Les usuaries deben ser mayores de 18 años.
  • Los bots están permitidos, mientras el contenido que publiquen no este federado, para evitar spam en las líneas federadas.
  • Las cuentas dedicadas solo a hacer publicidad no están permitidas
  • El contenido NSFW (Not Safe for Work) está permitido, pero sólo bajo un aviso de contenido (CW).
  • Está prohibida la discriminación a gente respecto a su género, identidad y expresión de género, orientación sexual, discapacidad, enfermedades mentales o físicas, neuro(a)tipicidad, apariencia física, estado de embarazo, estado de veterano, afiliación política, estado civil, tamaño corporal, edad, raza, origen nacional , origen étnico, nacionalidad, estatus migratorio, idioma, religión o falta de ella, u otro marcador de identidad. Esto incluye racismo anti-indígena y anti-negritud. Básicamente, no se permite ser opresivo con la gente marginalizada.
  • No se permite apología al fascismo ni nazismo.
  • No se permite contenido pedófilo,necrófilo ni zoofilo, ni siquiera ficticio.
  • No se permite el contenido ilegal en Chile. Esta instancia evita otras instancias que no cumplan el código de conducta mediante bloqueos.

Ich kann daher keine Garantie Ã¼ber eine aktuelle oder zukÃ¼nfige NÃ¼tzlichkeit oder Erreichbarkeit des Dienstes abgeben. Ich verspreche aber, im Rahmen meiner MÃ¶glichkeiten das Mastodon-Serverabkommen einzuhalten.

Sprache

Der Dienst richtet sich hauptsÃ¤chlich an Benutzer:innen aus dem Deutschen Sprachraum, alle ErklÃ¤rtexte sind nur auf Deutsch vorhanden. Das bedeutet natÃ¼rlich nicht, dass nicht in anderen Sprachen geschrieben werden darf und erst recht nicht, dass nicht Accounts gefolgt werden dÃ¼rfen, die in anderen Sprachen schreiben. Aber ich spreche selbst nur Deutsch und Englisch, bei anderen Sprachen bin ich mit der Moderation Ã¼berfordert.

Ãœber die Regeln

Die Serverregeln sind bewusst kurz gehalten, eine ausfÃ¼hrlichere Version mit ErlÃ¤uterungen befindet sich hier. Sollten die Regeln sich als unzureichend oder unklar erweisen, behalte ich mir vor, sie zu ergÃ¤nzen oder zu prÃ¤zisieren.

Ãœber Ãœber

An dieser "Ãœber"-Seite und den anderen Metatexten rund um Fnordon kann im git-Repository mitgearbeitet werden.

Overview

The Tabletop.VIP Community is dedicated to providing a harassment-free experience for everyone. We do not tolerate harassment of participants in any form. The rules within this document directly apply to all spaces managed by Tabletop.VIP.

Our main goal is to grow and sustain the community in a way that handles and learns from issues rather than ignores them or considers them ‘a one off’. We want people to take responsibility for their actions and learn from them, rather immediately resorting to punishment.

Code of conduct

This code of conduct applies to all Tabletop.VIP forums and online spaces.  Anyone who violates this code of conduct may be sanctioned or expelled from these spaces at the discretion of the Moderators. Participants are responsible for knowing and abiding by these rules.

Prohibited actions include:

  • Any language used in an abusive manner towards another community member.
  • Offensive comments related to gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, mental illness, neuro(a)typicality, physical appearance, body size, age, race, or religion.
  • Unwelcome comments regarding a person’s lifestyle choices and practices, including those related to drugs, employment, food, health, parenting, and religion.
  • Deliberate misgendering or use of rejected names.
  • Gratuitous or off-topic sexual images or behavior in spaces where they are not appropriate.
  • Physical contact and simulated physical contact (eg, textual descriptions like “hug” or “backrub”) without consent or after a request to stop.
  • Threats of violence.
  • Incitement of violence towards any individual, including encouraging a person to commit suicide or to engage in self-harm.
  • Deliberate intimidation.
  • Stalking or following.
  • Harassing photography or recording, including logging online activity for harassment purposes.
  • Sustained disruption of discussion.
  • Unwelcome sexual attention.
  • Pattern of inappropriate social contact, such as requesting/assuming inappropriate levels of intimacy with others
  • Continued one-on-one communication after requests to cease.
  • Deliberate “outing” of any aspect of a person’s identity without their consent except as necessary to protect vulnerable people from intentional abuse.
  • Publication of non-harassing private communication.
  • Disparagement humor, which makes a punchline of the marginalized.
  • Any continuation of a joke after a request to stop.

Moderators

A Moderators will exist to moderate community spaces and events, promote social engagement, and help support members of Tabletop.VIP in dealing with matters related to the code of conduct. The team will have the power to enforce rules within spaces managed by Tabletop.VIP.

Reporting

If a member of the Tabletop.VIP Community is harassing you, you notice that someone else is being harassed, or have any other concerns, please contact the Moderators.  If the person who is harassing you is on the team, they will recuse themselves from handling your incident. We will respond as promptly as we can.

This code of conduct applies to Tabletop.VIP Community spaces, but if a member of the Tabletop.VIP Community outside our spaces is harassing you, we still want to know about it. We will take all good-faith reports of harassment by Tabletop.VIP Community members seriously. This includes harassment outside our spaces and harassment that took place at any point in time. The Moderators reserves the right to exclude people from the Tabletop.VIP Community based on their past behavior, including behaviour outside Tabletop.VIP Community spaces and behavior towards people who are not in the Tabletop.VIP Community.

Tabletop.VIP Moderators members are not above the rules within this document.  Any complaints against members will be reviewed in the same manner as any other report, and subject to the same moderation rules plus any subsequent rules defined within their own team.

In order to protect volunteers from abuse and burnout, we reserve the right to reject any report we believe to have been made in bad faith. Reports intended to silence legitimate criticism may be deleted without response.

We will respect confidentiality requests for the purpose of protecting victims of abuse. At our discretion, we may publicly name a person about whom we have received harassment complaints, or privately warn third parties about them, if we believe that doing so will increase the safety of Tabletop.VIP Community members or the public. We will not name harassment victims without their affirmative consent.

Consequences

Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately.

If a participant engages in harassing behavior, the Moderators may take any action they deem appropriate, up to and including expulsion from all Tabletop.VIP Community spaces and identification of the participant as a harasser to other Tabletop.VIP Community members or the public.

Blocked Instances

The block list for this server is based on those provided by Mastodon.Social, Toot.Cafe, Tabletop.Social and the BLOCKChain list.

Attribution

This anti-harassment policy is based on the example policy from the Geek Feminism wiki, created by the Geek Feminism community.

Donations

If you like to contribute to the ongoing server costs of Tabletop.VIP, please donate on Ko-Fi.

Current Management Structure

The Benevolent Dictator holds ultimate decision-making power, until the group is ready for a more inclusive structure.

  • Values: Servant leadership, singular vision, voluntarism
  • Membership: Participation is open to anyone who wants to join, but the Benevolent Dictator can remove participants at will.
  • Autocracy: The Benevolent Dictator has authority and can change the group's governance as necessary.
    • Delegation: The Benevolent Dictator can invite participants to help with managing the group.
    • Expiration: When the group is sufficiently mature, the Benevolent Dictator will establish a more inclusive structure.
    • Executive: The Benevolent Dictator is responsible for implementingâ€”or delegating implementation ofâ€”policies and other decisions.
    • Lobbying: If participants are not happy with the Benevolent Dictator's leadership, they may voice their concerns or leave the group.
  • Friendship: Relationships among participants facilitate or inhibit governance processes.
  • Code of Conduct: Participants agree to abide by certain standards or face certain consequences.

Created By

Tabletop.VIP
Short: A growing Mastodon community for all things tabletop gaming related as well as other geekery at large.

While not an official Kubernetes server, we still strive to maintain the same high standards of conduct within our community.

Please report any and all violations of the code of conduct. Breaches of the CoC will result in an account ban.

Description:
Augsburg.Social ist mit Mastodon im Fediverse!

Hier ist alles kostenlos und ohne Werbung! Hier stecken keine Konzerne dahinter die sich an Deinen Daten bereichern wollen! Augsburg.Social wird rein privat in der Freizeit betrieben und gehostet. Ich erwirke keinerlei Einnahmen und Gewinn mit dem Angebot und finanziere es aus eigener Hand.

Augsburg.Social bietet diese Instanz an damit Du Deinen Weg ins Fediverse finden kannst. Der Dienst richtet sich an Augsburg und Umgebung.

Dieser Server wird kostenfrei zur VerfÃ¼gung gestellt. Es besteht kein Anspruch auf FunktionalitÃ¤t, Ausfallfreiheit oder FortfÃ¼hrung des Dienstes.

Dadurch behalte ich mir natÃ¼rlich vor die angebotenen Dienste jederzeit aus rechtlichen, technischen oder finanziellen GrÃ¼nden einzuschrÃ¤nken oder zur Not ganz abzuschalten. Ich werde mich jedoch bemÃ¼hen Euch frÃ¼hzeitig zu informieren falls so etwas eintreten sollte.

Falls ihr Fragen oder Probleme habt wendet Euch gern direkt auf Mastodon an @AnID@augsburg.social oder per E-Mail an admin@augsburg.social

Der Betrieb kostet viel Geld und Zeit. Strom und Hardwarekosten sind nicht gerade wenig... Wenn Ihr mich und diesen Dienst unterstÃ¼tzen wollt dann kÃ¶nnt Ihr sehr gerne etwas an https://www.buymeacoffee.com/anidaux spenden, um beizutragen, dass dieser Dienst auch noch lange online bleibt.

Description: A great place for our crowd or your crowd to hang out and share.

CityOfChicago.Live

CityOfChicago.Live

About This Server

CityOfChicago.Live is a decentralized, free and open alternative to Twitter based on Mastodon. Part of the Fediverse . Photo credit goes to Pedro Lastra

Backup Policy

Backups are made once a day and live backups are done on the first and last day of the month at 11:50pm cst. Expect the server to be down for a minute, an announcement will also be published to remind everyone

Donations/Ko-fi Account

Ko-Fi Helps us fund the server!

Code of Conduct

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of CityOfChicago.live; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

  1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
    1. Excessive advertising
    2. Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
    3. Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
    4. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  2. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
    1. Racism or advocation of racism
    2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
    3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
    4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
  3. The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
    1. Sexual depictions of children
    2. Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
    3. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
  4. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
    1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
    2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
    3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Description:
Nieuw West-Brabant

Wij zijn een initiatief van burgers en ondernemers die een lokale en regionale zelfdragende samenleving bouwen. In deze samenleving maken we gebruik van ieders kwaliteiten en zorgen we ervoor dat iedereen waarde heeft. We realiseren, ondersteunen en onderzoeken lokale initiatieven. Hierbij werken we samen op basis van gelijkwaardigheid, vertrouwen, positiviteit, verbinding en respect.

Onze droom

De komende jaren ontstaat een sterke, zelfdragende economie waarin mensen vreedzaam en op een waardige manier met elkaar samenleven. We hebben als burgers steeds meer facetten van het leven in eigen beheer.

Stapje voor stapje gaan we lokaal: je tomaten komen uit Dongen, je stukje vlees uit Chaam en de groenten uit een van de vele Bredase voedselbossen. We nemen het heft in eigen hand. Lees meer hierover in dit artikel van BN DeStem.

Onze werkwijze

Nieuw West-Brabant faciliteert, stimuleert en ondersteunt bestaande en nieuwe regionale initiatieven. Ze verbindt mensen met vergelijkbare ideeÃ«n en werkt in domeinen als Lokaal Ondernemen, Voeding, Gezondheid, Wonen en Lokaal Geld. Deelnemers worden straks lid van de coÃ¶peratie en daarmee ook mede-eigenaar van de beweging.

Onder de paraplu van Nieuw West-Brabant worden projecten en pilots opgezet waar leden van kunnen profiteren. Denk aan gezamenlijke inkoop van energie of regionale coÃ¶peratieve initiatieven voor voedsel.

We gaan graag de samenwerking aan met lokale politiek en publieke instituties. We bouwen op en zijn constructief. Ook hebben we contact met initiatieven als Society 4.0, Local Economic Forum (LEF) Ede en Vereniging Nieuw Westland. Nieuw West-Brabant opereert zelfstandig en is volledig onafhankelijk.

Doe mee!

We werken aan een sterke beweging die verandering initieert en een voortrekkersrol speelt in de creatie van een lokaal geÃ«nte economie. Hoe groter de schaal, hoe sterker de nieuwe samenleving. Wees ook een early-adopter. Zonder jou is er geen wij.

Contact

U kunt ons benaderen via onderstaande e-mailadressen.

  • Algemeen: info@nieuwwestbrabant.nl
  • Pers: jannes@nieuwwestbrabant.nl
  • Beheer Mastodon: sebastian@nieuwwestbrabant.nl

Correspondentie adres:
Etnastraat 20
4814 AA Breda (Nederland)
+31 76 760 2 800

KvK: 67708536
BTW: NL002031906B38
Short: Nieuw West-Brabant is een initiatief van Brabantse burgers en ondernemers die een lokale en regionale zelfdragende samenleving bouwen. #gelijkwaardig #positiviteit #verbinding #respect

Description:
The Mended Drum should serve as a welcoming home to any and all who remember Sir Terry Prachett (#gnuterrypratchett). Denizens of alt.fan.pratchett, alt.talk.mendeddrum and irc.lspace.org are especially welcome.

If this sounds like garbish to you, I congratulate you on your youth and wish you a very warm welcome if you like the writings of Terry Pratchett, Neil Gaiman, Douglas Adams, Charles Stross, Diane Duane, and more.

The Drum aims to be a friendly place. Should you come across content which does not belong here, do not hesitate to ask for moderation.

Please be informed that there are currently a couple of custom emoji available, which are :gnutp:, and the afp-tags :rtag: itag: :atag: :mtag: :ftag:.


This instance is open for registration, but on manual approval so as to be able to control the growth. Feel free to request an invite or wait for approval to happen, which should be within a day.

The Mended Drum is a voluntary undertaking. To be financially able to continue running it, and to show your appreciation, I have set up an OpenCollective page for it here. Many thanks and my eternal gratitude to all donors!
Short: This is the Mended Drum, Discworlds best known disreputable tavern.

Description: Rail.chat is administered by All Aboard NW @aanw. Support Rail.chat by donating to All Aboard NW at https://allaboardnw.org/support
Short: Discussing passenger and freight rail, its connections to transit and other non-car options, and the economic, environmental and equity benefits of seamless mobility.

Description:
This is a very lightweight mastodon instance for members of the AI ethics research community to chat, brainstorm, and share interesting work.

Until there is a reason to change them, general guidelines should be roughly the same as those at scholar.social. Be kind to each other!
Short: A mastodon instance hosted by the Distributed AI Research Institute (DAIR) for those invested in independent, community-rooted AI research.

Description:
You are welcome to join if the following resonates with you:

  • Let's explore how to change the way our society works to avoid climate breakdown as much as possible.
  • We trust in science as the best way of giving us a reliable picture of our environment and guidelines for necessary action.
  • In order not to go insane, let's talk about more the pleasant things in life too.
  • Humor is important!
  • We welcome and cherish criticism and challenges to our beliefs. However, we do not tolerate the intolerant. Hate and violence are not welcome here.

This server is run and paid for by private people. In case of questionable usage or abuse, the admins will try to resolve issues in a polite conversation, but they may ultimately decide to exclude users from this community without having to give a reason.

The admins reserve the right to delete accounts that have been inactive for at least half a year. Affected users will be notified before.

The admins will do their best to keep the user data secure but are not liable for any damages or data loss.

If we decide to shut down this instance, we will inform users about this at least three months in advance, giving them the chance to migrate their data somewhere else.
Short: Concerned about the climate, authoritarianism, war, billionaires and the power of big tech â€“ but still looking for a community that posts about less scary things too? This is for you.

Description:
A safe server for all women and/or LGBTQ+ identifying people. Our admins and mods are all drawn from within our membership. All sign-ups are approved by a mod.

We have authorized fetch enabled.

Support

If you'd like to support the operating costs of the server you can do so on Patreon or BuyMeACoffee for one-off contributions.

Admins

Our admin team: @admin @ellesaurus @totalclaireity

We have three admins to help maximize the likelihood that any given time there is someone available in case of any issues.

Rules

Rules are provided to give clarity to general behavioral expectations, and are not meant to be a comprehensive, loophole-free set of laws or hard-line absolutes. They are subject to admin and moderator interpretation. There will be no rules lawyering.

The intent of these rules is to facilitate a safe, fun environment for everyone. We are accessible and happy to engage with our instance members, so any questions and concerns are welcome.
Short: A safe Mastodon (posting) and Matrix (chat) for all women and/or LGBTQ+ identifying people. Our admins and mods are all drawn from within our membership. All sign-ups are approved by a mod.

Description: A place for musicians and those who love music to share.
Short: A place for musicians and those who love music to share.

Description:
Welcome to HorrorHub!

This is a large server run by one nerd.

Do you love horror? Stories, movies, narrations, artwork? So do I. That's why I started this instance. I've had this domain doing nothing for years, now I finally have something to use it for.

Message @bluebassist@horrorhub.club if you're a horror content creator and would like to be included in the recommended accounts list for new users!

Short: A Mastodon server for Horror fans.

Description:
The Fediverse is a decentralised federated social network. This server is maintained and used by hackers from The Netherlands (and elsewhere, probably). The software we use is glitch-soc, a fork of Mastodon.

Het Fediversum is een decentraal gefedereerd sociaal netwerk. Deze server wordt beheerd en gebruikt door hackers uit nederland (en vast ook elders). De software die we gebruiken is glitch-soc, een fork van Mastodon.

This Mastodon is hosted on a server sponsored by ProcoliX, with a NixOS config you can find here: https://github.com/hsnl-matrix/nixos
Nightly encrypted backups are sent to an AlphaVPS Storage box (pixie.town infra). Our email is hosted by Migadu.com, with a gracious 50% non-profit discount.
Short:
A fediverse server for the community of Dutch hackerspaces (HSNL)
contact: admin@hsnl.social

Description: Pleroma: An efficient and flexible fediverse server

Friendly neighborhood cat here to give you some information on the vibe of this instance if you were interested on signing up. We're a general instance full of predominantly queer, nerdy, and furry folk. This place is smaller than similar instances, and thus less chaotic. If you're someone who prefers a quiet corner, you'll find one here. Users here have a wide variety of interests, we have no niche.

Other instances may have a code of conduct along with a moderation staff to enforce the rules of the community. I've decided not to run this instance that way. On this instance, it's run according to how I want it to run. This doesn't mean it's an unfriendly place or that I rule with an iron fist, it just means that I'm the sole staff person, and that will always be the case. And for rules, they're extremely loose because I like giving people tools to curate their own feeds as opposed to trying to manage everyone's feeds for them.

That being said, I'll give you a quick idea of what sort of things I'm looking to keep off the local and federated feeds here so you can know in advance if you'll fit in or not.

- No Nazis, or really any pro fascist, nationalistic hate rhetoric that exists out there

- We're queer friendly here, so any bigots can find themselves the door out of here

- You would think I could just put, "no racism" here, but a lot of people haven't figured out how to do that yet so I need to say a bit more about it. I'm a white guy, and for some that's an understandable dealbreaker (no hard feelings), but for others I want to stress that I'm gonna do whatever I can to make sure you're comfortable here within reason. If an instance is harassing you repeatedly, they're gone if you let me know. My bullshit capacity is at a all time low. If an instance doesn't want to action their users for their racist bullshit, then I'm not gonna host them here. If it's coming from one of the users here, they're gone. I'm no nonsense and not here to play games or debate those sort of folks. If it bugs you, it'll probably bug me and I'm gonna take care of it regardless of consequences. I don't give a shit about fediverse relationships.

- That being said, if you're someone who tends to get into a lot of petty internet spats, and want someone to look out for you on the home instance, you might want to keep looking. I'm not gonna tolerate any user harassing users of different instances or repeatedly getting into fights with people. I have no issues kicking you out if I'm getting a lot of reports about your behavior. If you're the one being harassed however, and it's clearly evident, I will take action for you in that case.

- I have a pretty lax policy when it comes to content warnings. I don't strictly enforce users to use them, but I do encourage people to use them when posting anything that could be potentially triggering for someone. I advocate users using their judgement here, and expect people to use CWs appropriately. I will not force people to use them. I am not omnipresent and don't particularly wish to try to be, so if you see a user not tagging something that is triggering you, I would ask that you just mute them.

- Speaking of muting people, I really do stress the features given to you by the platform. Instead of posting something you know will start an argument with someone, just block them instead. An entire instance of shitposters is bugging you? Block the whole instance on your own instead of asking me to defederate with them or starting shit with them. I'm not here to manage your feeds when people are annoying or tasteless.

- Really, just use common sense. If you act like an adult and treat other people like adults, you'll have no issues here.

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
Short: 18+ queer, furry and nerd friendly general interest instance. Quieter and less chaotic than big instances, with relaxed moderation policies. Perfect for folk who want a peaceful corner to themselves.

Description:
The Lawprofs Mastodon Instance is administered by Jeremy Sheff. It is an online community for full-time legal academics. Please provide your institutional affiliation when registering.

Support us on Patreon

Our DMCA Registration Number is DMCA-1043496. DMCA Section 512 notices may be submitted using this form.
Short: A Mastodon Instance for Legal Academics. Please provide your institutional affiliation when registering.

Description:
Dragonchat is a safe, long-term community for dragons and dragon lovers. Welcome, rest your wings for a while!

Given the decentralized nature of Mastodon, while I intend on running this instance as long as there is interest (and I am able to do so), there is no guarantee as to the persistence of this site and anything that has been posted to it. Please do not use this site to host the only copy of your important stuff.
Please review the rules prior to joining. For any issues, please contact one of the admins:
  • @talon
Server thumbnail courtesy of @tracken
Hosting: Servers cost money. This one is (currently) $50/month, and while Dragonchat will forever be free to use, I have set up a Ko-fi if you would like to contribute towards its long-term success!
Short: Dragonchat- By dragons, for dragons.

Description:
Willkommen!

Wir mÃ¶chten allen Wesen, die unsere Welt kreativ gestalten und Neues erschaffen wollen, eine Heimat bieten. Dabei ist uns ein respektvoller Umgang wichtig. Daher haben wir uns einige Regeln gegeben, um eine inkusive und kreative Umgebung zu schaffen. Generell aber gilt: Be excellent to each other!

cultur.social steht fÃ¼r eine respektvolle Netzkultur, Verwirklichung von Ideen, kulturelle Werte, Inspiration und Diskurs, den Kampf um eine bessere Welt und vieles mehr.

Regeln

  • Um eine rÃ¼cksichtsvolle und freundliche AtmosphÃ¤re zu schaffen, stehen Wekzeuge zur VerfÃ¼gung, die konsequent eingesetzt werden sollten. Dazu gehÃ¶ren Inhaltswarnungen (insbesondere bei potenziell verstÃ¶renden oder kontroversen Themen) und die Verwendung von Bildbeschreibungen fÃ¼r Mediendateien.

  • Halte dich an Gesetze! Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind, werden gelÃ¶scht und kÃ¶nnen zur sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos fÃ¼hren.

  • Wir tolerieren keinerlei diskriminierende Inhalte. Insbesondere Inhalte geeignet sind die UnterdrÃ¼ckung von Mitgliedern von Randgruppen fÃ¶rdern werden nicht geduldet.

  • Wir dulden kein bedrohliches oder belÃ¤stigendes Verhalten, enschlieÃŸlich Doxxing, Stalking, Brigading, Dogpiling oder jede andere Form der ungewollten Kontaktaufnahme mit einer Nutzer*in. Weitehin wird Mobbing, einschlieÃŸlich Beschimpfungen, absichtlich falsche Geschlechter-Ansprache oder Deadnaming, nicht toleriert.

  • Nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolik, die FÃ¶rderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus, VerschwÃ¶rungserzÃ¤hlungen sind hier nicht erwÃ¼nscht.

  • Wir dulden Bots nur in engen Grenzen und in Absprache mit den Admins. Bots mÃ¼ssen immer eindeutig als solche markiert werden. Automatisierte BeitrÃ¤ge sollten immer als "Nicht gelistet" gepostet werden. Damit sorgen wir fÃ¼r eine lokale Timeline die dem Austausch untereinander dient.

  • SÃ¤mtliche verfÃ¼gbaren Daten (inklusive der Inhalte, Medien und Metadaten) auf cultur.social dÃ¼rfen nicht fÃ¼r maschinelles Lernen oder andere "Forschungszwecke" verwendet werden. Ausnahmen sind nur mit ausdrÃ¼cklicher Zustimmung der involvierten Nutzer*innen gestattet. Die Admins sind in jedem Fall vorab zu informieren.

  • Spam ist nicht gestattet. Spam-Konten werden nach dem Ermessen der Moderator*innen gelÃ¶scht.

  • Augenscheinliche Fake-Konten (Impersonation) von Personen und Institionen kÃ¶nnen nach dem Ermessen der Moderator*innen markiert, gesperrt oder unter UmstÃ¤nden auch gelÃ¶scht werden.

  • Diese Instanz darf nicht zur Verbreitung von Pornografie bzw. sexuell expliziter Texte, Bilder, Videos und sonstigen Medien genutzt werden. Potentiell anstÃ¶ÃŸige Inhalte ausserhalb dieser Definition mÃ¼ssen mit einer entsprechenden Inhaltswarnung versehen werden. Hierbei gilt: Inhalte lieber einmal zu Oft taggen, als einmal zu wenig. Accounts, die Ã¼berwiegend oder ausschlieÃŸlich der Verbreitung von "NSFW"-Inhalten dienen kÃ¶nnen durch die Moderator*innen entsprechend markiert werden. In extremen FÃ¤llen kann eine LÃ¶schung erfolgen.

  • Inaktive bzw. leere Konten (keine Posts, Follower, Following) kÃ¶nnen nach einer angemessenen Frist entfernt werden.

  • Handlungen, die darauf abzielen, diese Instanz oder ihre Leistung zu schÃ¤digen, kÃ¶nnen zur sofortigen Sperrung des Accounts fÃ¼hren.

Bitte melde ein Verhalten, welches dich stÃ¶rt. Wir werden deine Meldung vertraulich behandeln.

Wenn bei einer Meldung zu einem potentiellen VerstoÃŸ gegen diese Regeln weitere Untersuchungen erfordern um eine Entscheidung herbei zu fÃ¼hren, behalten sich die Moderator*innen das Recht vor, sofort zu handeln, um potenzielle Opfer von Fehlverhalten und die Gemeinschaft zu schÃ¼tzen.

Die Kommunikation zum Zwecke der Moderation ist in deutscher oder englischer Sprache mÃ¶glich. Jegliche Meldungen, EinsprÃ¼che und BegrÃ¼ndungen in anderen Sprachen mÃ¼ssen wir ablehnen, da die Sprachbarriere eine fundierte Entscheidung bei uneindeutiger Sachlage unmÃ¶glich macht. Im Zweifel sehen wir uns in solchen FÃ¤llen dem Schutz der Gemeinschaft verprflichtet.

Diese Regeln sind inspiriert von chaos.social, bsd.network und digitalcourage.social! Vielen Dank an die groÃŸartige Community!

Disclaimer

Diese Instanz wird durch die MicroMovie Media GmbH und dem Team von GuidePilot unterstÃ¼tzt. Sie ist inhaltlich, redaktionell und administrativ aber vollstÃ¤ndig unabhÃ¤ngig.

Die Moderation Ã¼bernehmen zur Zeit @babelsberg, @Keiner und @daniel. Wichtige Infos zur Instanz werden zentral Ã¼ber den Account @chief verÃ¶ffentlicht.

Attribution

  • Original-Motiv des cultur.social Branding
Short: FÃ¼r alle Wesen, die unsere Welt kreativ gestalten und Neues erschaffen wollen.

Description:
This is an inclusive space for the ska community, including musicians, artists, fans and more. It is also a place for all well-meaning sentient beings, who just want a fun place to socialize.

We welcome everyone from the ska, punk, reggae, rocksteady, new wave, or other related music fandoms. We are also proud proponents of the Ska Goth Alliance.

"Do I have to talk about only ska?" No! While Skastodon exists to serve the ska community, you can talk about whatever is on your mind (as long as you follow our server rules). We have friends on many servers with many interests, and would never limit conversations to just one topic.

Follow @skastodon@skastodon.com for more information!

Offsite Contact

If you need to contact Skastodon without logging in, please email mailto:skastodon@skastodon.com.

Please consider supporting Skastodon

Skastodon is an independent site. Please consider making a donation on BuyMeACoffee or Ko-Fi.

You can also support Skastodon by buying merchandise at our Threadless or TeePublic stores.

Legal

View our DMCA policy here.

Machine Learning policy

Content posted to Skastodon.com is not to be scraped, mirrored, copied, or otherwise used for machine learning purposes. Prohibited actions include using text or images on Skastodon for large language models, image generators, or any similar products or services.
Short: A Mastodon server for ska musicians, artists, fans, and anyone else in the ska community.

Description:
Welcome to the Floofs!

Admin/Owners Members:
These members have access to the servers running this mastodon instance.

  • @Arch (SysAdmin)
  • @Ekkoklang (Moderation)
  • @Kakious (SysAdmin)

If you have any questions, concerns please feel free to message or contact us.

Regarding Moderation

*STILL A WIP*

About the hosting of this instance

This instance uses a dedicated hypervisor that is running a Talos based Kubernetes cluster and a WAF. It can be easily expanded with more hypervisors due to the OSPF routing we have in place to spin up a new VM or hypervisor with internal access to the cluster easily.

Servers

  • 3x Kubernetes control nodes
  • 3x kobolds (Kubernetes worker nodes)
  • floofy-postal - SMTP Routing Server
  • floofy-db - DB Server
  • floofy-elastic-search - Elastic Search Instance
  • floofy-wazuh - Logging/Security Server

You can view the status of the servers at status.floofy.tech. We monitor all services required to run this instance. (This is out of date, please wait while we rebuild this monitoring stack)

Offical Contact Information

Please send all DMCA requests to dmca@floofy.tech, all other requests please contact us at support@floofy.tech.

See meta.floofy.tech for more details about emoji used on this server and more!

The amazing banner artwork was created by @Juniper
Short: A primary furry/tech instance full of wonderful beans.
topic: Floofy.tech -  Where the fluffy beans run around

Description:
Un fantasma recorre Europa... y es el fantasma del frikismo. En estos tiempos donde las grandes cadenas de ropa tienen pijamas de Spiderman o sudaderas de Naruto, o Disney se compra Star Wars, los frikis se distinguen porque comparten, comentan y divulgan sus aficiones.

En el Frikiverse queremos ser sobre todo una instancia multitemÃ¡tica, donde #frikis de todas las tendencias hablemos sobre nuestras aficiones y aprendamos de las aficiones de los otros, pero tambiÃ©n un punto de encuentro donde podamos compartir las cosas que nos pasan en la #SagaRealidad. No pretendemos que sÃ³lo se hable de cosas frikis, sino tambiÃ©n que haya frikis hablando de sus cosas.

En el Frikiverse nos gusta hablar de #libros, #cÃ³mics, #ilustraciÃ³n, #series, #cine, #manga, #anime, #mÃºsica o cualquier otro soporte de transmisiÃ³n de la #Cultura. Pero tambiÃ©n de aficiones, mÃ¡s o menos afines, como la #astronomÃ­a, la #informÃ¡tica y la #tecnologÃ­a, el #rol y los #juegosDeMesa, los #juegos de ordenador o de consola, la #fÃ­sica y las #matemÃ¡ticas, la #historia, la #mitologÃ­a, el #arte, los #idiomas y la #lingÃ¼Ã­stica, la #fotografÃ­a, destinos mÃ¡gicos (como #JapÃ³n o #BretaÃ±a) y muchas otras. Si alguna vez te han llamado friki por dedicar mucho tiempo a una aficiÃ³n, esta es tu casa.

Nuestro objetivo es ser una instancia "pequeÃ±a", donde pueda haber un sentimiento de comunidad. Nos gustarÃ­a llegar a ser unos pocos centenares de usuarios activos. Para aumentar el contenido disponible, y la difusiÃ³n de nuestras publicaciones, estamos en el relay.tkz.one junto a otras instancias en castellano. TambiÃ©n usamos relays de lectura especÃ­ficos con instancias afines como xarxa.cloud o paquita.masto.host.

Nuestra polÃ­tica de moderaciÃ³n pretende mantener un espacio del Fediverse que sea seguro e inclusivo, con la mÃ­nima moderaciÃ³n posible, pero con toda la moderaciÃ³n necesaria. Como instancia, nos comprometemos a cumplir los criterios establecidos en el Mastodon Server Covenant.

El contenido publicado es propiedad de sus respectivos autores, y no debe ser usado fuera de Mastodon sin su consentimiento. Las ilustraciones de Ciudad Friki y del Pato del Kaos que decoran la instancia son creaciones originales para el Frikiverse de @PukaMuriska@mastodon.art.
Short: El Frikiverse es una comunidad para frikis de todas las tendencias. Por defecto en castellano, pero todo idioma es bienvenido. Las solicitudes son revisadas lo antes posible.

Description:
The Cville.Online community is open to anyone from the Charlottesville area interested in helping to create a more livable Cville area for everyone.
Highly Recommended
-- As soon as you register, add a photo and complete your profile, and post an #introduction message about your connection to Cville. This will greatly increase the odds that others will follow you.
-- Turn on two-factor authentication in your personal settings.
Code of Conduct
-- Be kind to yourself and others.
-- We keep each other safe--if you see unkind content or behavior, flag it.
Prohibited
-- Hate speech
-- Links to illegal content
-- Spam
-- Pornography
-- Nudity without NSFW tag
Managed by
The server is managed by @steven@cville.online
What to expect
-- I registered the domain, am paying for a hosting service, and a low-cost email service. So far the costs are manageable, but as the server grows in popularity I anticipate additional expenses.
-- If you'd like to chip in with time please send me a direct message or an email at steven.l.johnson@gmail.com.
-- If you want to chip in with treasure, my venmo account is @StevenLJohnson and my Paypal address is steven.l.johnson@gmail.com. Your contributions are most appreciated.
Short: A small regional Mastodon server open to everyone interested in creating a more livable Cville area for all. We keep each other safe.

Description:
Welcome!

WEBPERF.SOCIAL is a place for those who care about web performance, from novices to professionals. Everyone in related fields is also welcome. It is an open-source, social network based on Mastodon. Managed by @ryantownsend@webperf.social

The primary instance language is English.

Best efforts are made to keep the server up and running, but sometimes things may be outside the admin's control, such as the managed hosting provider experiencing downtime.

When applying to join

When you sign up to join, you will be asked to provide an answer to "Why do you want to join?". Take a moment to write down your response. If your response is unrelated to web performance, web technologies, and web development, or is lacking the requested information, your application to join will likely be rejected.

Please include links to your other social media accounts for verification, again, without this your application will likely be rejected.

This server is committed to the Mastodon Server Covenant and is hosted in France by Masto.host.

Content not allowed

The following rules are a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviors and types of content that may lead to the deletion of posts, silencing, or suspension of accounts, at the discretion of the instance administrators, as described in the webperf.social Terms.

  • Any illegal content (doxing, leaking private information, underage content, etc)
  • Adult (pornography) content
  • Spam
  • Commercial advertisements
  • Racism
  • Political content
  • Alt-right, including under the disguise of freedom of speech
  • Gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  • National Socialism
  • Nazism
  • Holocaust denial
  • Gender-critical
  • Sex and gender discrimination
  • Transphobia
  • Misogyny
  • Trolling, insulting, and derogatory comments toward others using a webperf.social account
  • Spreading falsehoods, alternative facts, anecdotal evidence, prejudice or bias towards a social group, inciting violence, circular reporting, shock-provoking content, conspiracy theories, dark patterns, deepfakes, disinformation, misinformation, sensationalism, truthiness, propaganda, rumors, hoaxes, urban myths, pseudoscience, post-truth, and opinion pieces or interviews that convey any of the previous.
  • Threats of Physical violence against any person, or institution.

Reporting harassment/content breaking rules / other

Please report the user using the "â€¦" button and then "Report". Include posts in the report it makes the moderator's job easier.

If it's not breaking the server rules or SPAM, please DO NOT report the content. If it's something that you don't like, in the "â€¦" button you can also Mute or Block someone.

Copyrights

All product names, logos, and brands are the property of their respective owners. All company, product, and service names used in this website are for identification purposes only. Use of these names, logos, and brands does not imply endorsement.
Short:
webperf.social is a place for professionals working in the field of web development who care about web performance.

Sponsored by TWNSND.com
A place for linguists, philologists, and other lovers of languages.

Du bist ein Kind des Ruhrgebiets? Das Ruhrgebiet ist deine Heimat? Du machst gern Urlaub im Pott? Du bist einfach nur neugierig? Dann tritt dieser Instanz bei und tausche dich mit netten Menschen aus.

Description:
mcr.wtf

This is community open to all whilst intended for people in, from, identify with or are just interested in Greater Manchester! The aim is to maintain an instance for general use but wouldn't it be nice to have a local timeline showing all the cool stuff going on in the best city in the world!

This is a friendly community. There are rules, which we will enforce, but they basically boil down to asking you to be nice. If you can't be nice, there's other instances for you to use. We federate with most instances but we will defederate from instances which host accounts which harass our users or repeatedly introduce unacceptable content on our timeline.

Help us out!

Running this server currently costs us about thirty quid a month. We expect that to grow. If you're able and you'd like to help out, you can buy us a coffee/beer here!
Short: A community open to all whilst intended for people in, from, identify with or are just interested in Greater Manchester!

Description:
We are the Mastodon server built by Earpers for Earpers. This instance exists to celebrate all things Wynonna Earp: The comic, the TV show, the cast and crew, and our famdom.

If you are here to Earp and want to build safe and supportive community together, we may be the home for you. We are LGBTQIA-forward and neurospicy-friendly. Most of our content is in English but we are a global community.

You as you are, are ok.

Everyone welcome*

E4L ğŸ“¬

Code of Conduct

The code of conduct at Earp Nation can be summarized as "Do no harm, but take no shit." *Everyone welcome, but not all behavior is welcome. For more details our full code of conduct is being drafted (coming soon!)

Support Earp Nation

If you enjoy your time on Earp Nation and want to support what we're doing here, you can do so in a number of ways:

  • Our current hosting expenses are about 25USD a month, and we are covered for the next 6-9 months, but you can tip Admin here and every little bit helps!
  • Spread the word to other Earpers that we are here
  • Welcome new members & help each other learn to use our platform

Team

Dean owns and operates the server with the help of a team of Earpers:

  • @angels_shield, Dean's Admin Alt
  • @LyraSullyvanMod, Lyra's Moderator Alt

Reporting and moderation

When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behaviour, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment. This is especially important when the content is in a language nobody on the moderation team speaks.

We aim to handle reports within 24 hours. Please mind that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a punitive action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offenses.

Community Events

Wherever you are on the Fediverse, you can join in!

Mondays

  • Celebrate Melanie Scrofano with #MelCrushMonday
  • New eps of Late Night at the Homestead drop wherever you get your podcasts

Tuesdays

  • Celebrate Tim Rozon and the men of Earp with #TimStacheTuesday

Wednesdays

  • Our holy day: #WayhaughtWednesday or #Wynaught rights, why pick just one?

Thursdays

  • Celebrate Dom P-C with #DomIsTheBombThursday
  • Earp Movie Watch, 8pm Eastern

Fridays

  • Party with #FandrasFriday, #FoundFamilyFriday

Saturdays

  • Celebrate Kat Barrell with #Katurday

Sundays

  • Celebrate the heart of our show with #EarpSistersSunday
  • Earp Movie Watch, Noon Eastern

We can also be found at #EarperCreations and #EarperSupport
Short: The Mastodon server built by Earpers for Earpers. If you are here to Earp and want to build safe and supportive community, we may be the home for you. Everyone welcome. We got you, Earp. E4L ğŸ“¬

Description:
General

This instance is intended for the Babyfur community. Only 18+ members are allowed. This is a subculture of the Furry fandom. This is a safe space for all Babyfur related material. You WILL see diapers here!

Special features

This instance has some modifications from the standard Mastodon source:

  • Video file size up to 512MB (normal instances are 40MB) and resolution up to 3840x2160@60fps (normal instances are 1920x1200)
  • Image size up to 5120x2880
  • Avatars and profile banners up to 10MB (Normal instances are 2MB)

Server hardware specs

This server runs on physical hardware. It has dozens of cores, hundreds of gigabytes of memory and 36TB of ZFS RAID-Z storage with enterprise grade drives with 1TB of NVMe cache. It is in a datacenter and is backed up off-site daily. It also has multiple administrators.

New to Mastodon? Checkout How To Mastodon
Short: Babyfurs (furry subculture) instance. 18+ only.

Description:
Welcome to Furry.Energy!

This is a furry run mastodon server but is welcome to all.

Server Donations accepted at Patreon Personal donations accepted at: Ko-Fi

Official Accounts:

  • @Admin
  • @Transparency

Administrators

  • @Nightpaws
  • @TerrenceFoxFur

Moderators

  • @Grejurn

Trend Moderators

  • @CamashRed

Server Information:

This server is hosted on the Cloud in the UK with the following specifications:

  • 4x CPU Cores
  • 24 GB RAM
  • Media cache is being stored in UK Wasabi S3 storage
  • DNS & local caching via cloudflare.
  • HTTPS is served via Let's Encrypt
  • Data is encrypted in Transit & at Rest in the datacenter
  • Translation is provided by DeepL

Automation

  • Service Status: Uptime Robot (Bookmark this!)
  • Maintenance Job Status? (Backup/Cleanup/Cert Renewal):

This server uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 International License.

House Rules (Code of Conduct)

Last Updated: June 5th 2023

  1. You must be 18+ to join and above age of consent - whichever is higher in your jusidiction.
  2. Be nice to each other.
  3. Content warn all NSFW content with "NSFW" and other tags
  4. Illegal content will result in an immediate ban. Illegal is subject to UK Laws.
  5. No suggestive content depicting minors or 'cub' art.
  6. No slurs, transphobia, hate material, spam, AI/NFT art, discrimination or anything of the kind.
  7. Servers refusing to moderate such content will be blocked. Please notify a moderator if you become aware of such servers.
  8. These rules are subject to being amended and updated at any time. Updates will be accompanied by an announcement.
  9. Please review our Extended Code of Conduct and Terms of Service for more information.
Short:
Furry.Energy is a UK based Mastodon Server oriented towards those in the furry & LGBTQA+ communities.

Techie? Musician? Gamer? Hiking? Share your hobbies too, all are welcome!

Description:
Want to join Cloud Island?

Cloud Island is a paid membership instance, and payments are currently handled through the Cloud Island Patreon.

If you can't afford our subscription fee but would like to join anyway, please reach out via the contact information above!

About

Cloud Island is a paid membership, pro-actively moderated instance. Cloud Island exists because it's important to have locally-owned social networking, a neighbourhood community that's by us, for us, and seeks to resist the systemic oppression that may impact us.

We keep all our data in Aotearoa New Zealand, don't track you, and won't sell your data.

We're charging money to help get to a point where we can pay moderators and developers to improve both Cloud Island and the fediverse as a whole.

"Cloud Island" is a registered trademark of Eiara Limited.

Emoji

Pride flag emoji on this instance are CC-BY-SA, and can be found on Github.

Blobhaj emoji on this instance are CC-BY-4.0 https://plush.city/@heatherhorns and can be found on this post.

Can of worms, Enbyghost, Transghost, and Breaddab are courtesy of olivvysaur.

The x-ray emoji on this instance is CC-BY-SA 4.0, courtesy of OpenMoji.

The :forg:, :kakapo:, :shramp: and :subtoot: emoji are CC0, courtesy of https://mastodon.art/@Curator/.

The :rss: emoji is GPL licensed, sourced from Wikipedia

The :laserkiwi: emoji was sourced from Mastodon.nz, based on the "Fair use" terms listed on Wikipedia

Hosting

This instance is proudly hosted in Aotearoa New Zealand, on the Catalyst Cloud.

Code of Conduct

Version: 1.01
Last updated: 2022-12-01

TLDR:

Cloud Island has a zero-tolerance policy for racism, antisemitism, Islamophobia, xenophobia, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, casteism, and any other forms of discriminatory and bigoted conduct. Nudity, sexually graphic, and violent imagery is not permitted on Cloud Island.

Harassment of other fediverse users is not permitted on Cloud Island.

Misinformation and content harmful to the public good (for example, â€œ5G causes coronavirusâ€ or â€œvaccines cause autismâ€) is not allowed and will be removed, and may result in an account suspension.

Sexual harassment is an instant ban.

Far-right content, expression of far-right ideologies, and/or the advocation thereof is an instant ban.

Aside from producing legal nudity or sexually graphic imagery, Cloud Island considers all other conduct performed outside of Cloud Island to be applicable under this Code of Conduct, and users may be reported based on that conduct.

The Long Version

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of Cloud Island; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

Unacceptable Content

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

  • Excessive advertising, and
  • Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources.

The following types of content will be removed, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

  • Any nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions,
  • Any gore and/or extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions,
  • Racism or advocation of racism,
  • Sexism or advocation of sexism,
  • Distribution of content harmful to the public good, examples including (but not limited to):
    • â€œ5G causes coronavirusâ€,
    • â€œVaccines cause autismâ€ (or, for clarity, any other anti-vaccine content)
  • Misinformation,
  • Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof,
    • Including "gender critical" and other transphobic content,
  • Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism, or the advocation thereof,
  • Casteism, or the advocation thereof, and
  • Ableism or the advocation thereof.

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed, and will result in permanent revocation of access to the service:

  • Content such as holocaust denial, Nazi symbolism, promoting the ideology of National Socialism, or any adjacent ideologies.

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed, will result in permanent revocation of access to the service, and will result in a referral of any and all user-generated content, including all personally identifiable information, to the New Zealand Police Force:

  • Content that is â€œobjectionableâ€, as defined by the Films, Videos, and Publications Classification Act (1993),
  • Content that is in breach of Aotearoa New Zealand court-mandated suppression orders.

Harassment

Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilising the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service and/or referral to the New Zealand Police force, at our discretion.

This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviours:

  • Offensive comments related to gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, mental illness, neuro(a)typicality, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion,
  • Unwelcome comments regarding a personâ€™s lifestyle choices and practices, including those related to food, health, parenting, drugs, and employment,
  • Deliberate misgendering or use of â€˜deadâ€™ or rejected names,
  • Gratuitous or off-topic sexual images or behaviour in spaces where theyâ€™re not appropriate,
  • Physical contact and simulated physical contact (eg, textual descriptions like â€œhugâ€ or â€œbackrubâ€) without consent or after a request to stop,
  • Threats of violence,
  • Incitement of violence towards any individual, including encouraging a person to commit suicide or to engage in self-harm,
  • Deliberate intimidation,
  • Stalking or following,
  • Harassing photography or recording, including logging online activity for harassment purposes,
  • Sustained disruption of discussion,
  • Unwelcome sexual attention,
  • Pattern of inappropriate social contact, such as requesting/assuming inappropriate levels of intimacy with others,
  • Continued one-on-one communication after requests to cease,
  • Deliberate â€œoutingâ€ of any aspect of a personâ€™s identity without their consent except as necessary to protect vulnerable people from intentional abuse,
  • Publication of non-harassing private communication,
  • Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed,
  • Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxxing) may be considered harassment,
  • Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

Cloud Island and Eiara Limited prioritise the safety of marginalised people over the comfort of privileged people. As a result, we will not act on complaints regarding, but not limited to:

  • â€˜Reverseâ€™ -isms, including â€˜reverse racism,â€™ â€˜reverse sexism,â€™ and â€˜cisphobiaâ€™,
  • Reasonable communication of boundaries, such as â€˜leave me aloneâ€™, â€˜go awayâ€™, or â€˜Iâ€™m not discussing this with youâ€™,
  • Communicating in a â€˜toneâ€™ you donâ€™t find congenial, and
  • Criticising racist, sexist, cissexist, or otherwise oppressive behaviour or assumptions.

Participants asked to stop any harassing behaviour are expected to comply immediately.

Reporting

If you are being harassed by a user of Cloud Island, notice that someone else is being harassed, or have any other concerns, please contact Eiara Limited at abuse@cloudisland.nz, or using the â€˜Report Postâ€™ or â€˜Report Userâ€™ feature in Mastodon.

If the person who is harassing you is on the moderation team, they will recuse themselves from handling your incident. We will respond as promptly as we can.

This Code of Conduct applies to Cloud Island, but if you are being harassed by a user of Cloud Island outside our Service, we still want to know about it.

We will take all good-faith reports of harassment by Cloud Island members, especially our moderation team, seriously. This includes harassment outside our spaces and harassment that took place at any point in time.

We reserve the right to exclude people from Cloud Island based on their past behaviour, including behaviour outside Cloud Island spaces and behaviour towards people who are not users of Cloud Island.

Reports intended to silence legitimate criticism may be deleted without response.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.
Short: A paid membership, strongly and pro-actively moderated Mastodon instance hosted entirely in Aotearoa New Zealand.

Description:
Unsere Community

Trete unserer freundlichen Creator Community bei, welche bereits viele bekannte deutsche Creator behaust, um

  • neue Creator kennen zu lernen
  • deine Fans auf ganz Mastodon auf dem Laufenden zu halten

    • Wir freuen uns dich bei uns begrÃ¼ÃŸen zu dÃ¼rfen. â˜ºï¸

    Profilliste

    Hier eine Auswahl an Creatorn, welche wir behausen: @Dechangeman @Razzortainment @Vlesk @apfeltalk @GermanLetsPlay @einHolzkopf @izzi @Endzeitkind @annitheduck @marmeladenoma @frankfurterbuchmesse ... Alle Profile

    Ãœber uns

    Hey ğŸ‘‹ğŸ¼, Ich bin @janik, vielleich kennst du mich ja auch als Enkel der YouTuberin und Streamerin Marmeladenoma. Zusammen mit einem liebenswerten Moderationsteam betreibe ich diese Instanz um es Creatorn zu ermÃ¶glichen die Vorteile der Twitter Alternative Mastodon zu nutzen.
    Falls Fragen bestehen, kÃ¶nnt ihr euch jederzeit an unsere Mail wenden. Wir helfen euch gerne weiter. ğŸ™‚

    Unser Ziel

    Unser Antrieb ist es Personen zu zeigen, dass Mastodon eine fantastische Alternative zu Twitter darstellt. Mastodon ist komplett dezentral, Open-Source, UnabhÃ¤ngig von der Werbeindustrie und untereinander vernetzt.

    Mit einer groÃŸen Creator Community, welche als Vorbild agiert, kÃ¶nnen wir genau das erreichen und Follower auf Mastodon aufmerksam machen, zusÃ¤tzlich innerhalb der Community kÃ¶nnen wir coole Events und Projekte umsetzen.

Description:
You can help support this community with a donation to our Patreon.

Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct

Our Pledge

In the interest of fostering an open and welcoming environment, we as contributors and maintainers pledge to make participation in our project and our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body size, disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity and expression, level of experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation.

Our Standards

Examples of behavior that contributes to creating a positive environment include:

  • Using welcoming and inclusive language
  • Being respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences
  • Gracefully accepting constructive criticism
  • Focusing on what is best for the community
  • Showing empathy towards other community members

Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:

  • The use of sexualized language or imagery and unwelcome sexual attention or advances
  • Trolling, insulting/derogatory comments, and personal or political attacks
  • Public or private harassment
  • Publishing othersâ€™ private information, such as a physical or electronic address, without explicit permission
  • Other conduct which could reasonably be considered inappropriate in a professional setting

All toots (public and private) should abide by the following rules:

  • Do not post any illegal content, including sexual depictions of children, or any other content illegal in the United States.
  • Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, genderist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.
  • Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks.
  • Posting or threatening to post other peopleâ€™s personally identifying information (â€œdoxingâ€) constitutes harassment.
  • Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
  • Do not post adult content without a content warning, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).
  • Do not spread disinformation or conspiracy theories that undermine public health. Healthy scientific debate is allowed but baseless, harmful conspiracies will not be tolerated.
  • Holocaust denial, Nazi symbolism, and promotion of National Socialism is strictly forbidden.
  • Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags constitute spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine, however, to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on â€” just keep the toot itself interesting).
  • Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community, without explicit permission from the the administrator and/or moderators of vermont.masto.host. It is fine to post with an automated tool (e.g., a Twitter cross-poster) so long as you are an active member of the vermont.masto.host community and respond to replies you receive here. However, unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.

    • Our Responsibilities

    Project maintainers are responsible for clarifying the standards of acceptable behavior and are expected to take appropriate and fair corrective action in response to any instances of unacceptable behavior.

    Project maintainers have the right and responsibility to remove, edit, or reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, and other contributions that are not aligned to this Code of Conduct, or to ban temporarily or permanently any contributor for other behaviors that they deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, or harmful.

    Scope

    This Code of Conduct applies within all project spaces, and it also applies when an individual is representing the project or its community in public spaces.

    Examples of representing a project or community include using an official project e-mail address, posting via an official social media account, or acting as an appointed representative at an online or offline event. Representation of a project may be further defined and clarified by project maintainers.

    Enforcement

    Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting the project team at brendankinney AT gmail.com. All complaints will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. The project team is obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

    Further details of specific enforcement policies may be posted separately. Project maintainers who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct in good faith may face temporary or permanent repercussions as determined by other members of the projectâ€™s leadership.

    Attribution

    This Code of Conduct is adapted from the Contributor Covenant, version 1.4, available at https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/1/4/code-of-conduct.html

    For answers to common questions about this code of conduct, see https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq
Short: A Mastodon instance for Vermonters and Vermonters at heart.

Description:
This eighteenth-century-themed instance is provided by your administrator and several donor members as a service to the scholarly community.

The blocked domains are drawn from Fediblock lists of servers that violate our rules against hate and spam. If you would like to discuss why a particular domain is blocked or not blocked, please contact your admin.
Short: This is a Mastodon instance for scholars of eighteenth-century global culture, history, literature, philosophy, and ideas.

Description:
We're creating a safe space for naked content creators and activists.

Welcome to The Body Social, a small community dedicated to naked content creators and activists looking for a space to explore and share simple, non-sexual nudity inside the fediverse.

Audience

Mastodon and the fediverse, collectively, encompass around 11 million users and around 1.8 million active users per month (source: FediDB). Our community is intentionally small, but has access to 25,000 other communities which can be seamlessly followed and posted to from the comfort of The Body Social.

Moderation

Keeping a safe space for naked content creators requires moderation that can't commonly be found in larger communities. We're here to treat our members with care and help them grow by moderating from a philosophy compatible with their own.

Our beliefs

  • You only get one body, so enjoy it
  • Be in tune with your body on a deeper level
  • Health and happiness above the expectations of others
  • Unwind the association of sexuality and nudity
  • Clothing is optional and that choice shouldn't diminish your dignity

Naturism

A lot of our members tend to come with a background in naturism. You can read more about that at naturism.is.

Our service promise to you

Our top priorities are to keep your data backed up and safe and your experience here seamless and uninterrupted.

How we're funded

The Body Social is self-funded at the moment and not seeking any funding. This may change in the future as we explore options, such as obtaining non-profit member organization status.
Short: Body positivity and acceptance social network celebrating our bodies.
